course_title: Topics in Texts and Culture: Neurosciences in Brazil
class_notes:
This course combines scientific study with the history of neuroscience in Brazil, an analysis of regional differences and cultures, and how scientific funding impacts national research agendas.


This course will be conducted in English.
Please reach out to Liz Mills (emills9@emory.edu) for department consent to enroll.
course_description: Prepare students for the study of the language, discourse and cultural production of the Hispanic world.
schedule_location: W 4pm-6:45pm in Emerson Chemistry Bldg. E103
